about_the_game:
If you like this game, please add it to your wish list~

Plot summary:

The kingdom’s traitors were tried and the demon king was sealed again. When the country’s crisis was lifted, the brave ushered in his holiday.
I want to be with the queen of this country! Go on vacation together~!

Small island! Beach! swimsuit!

I want to... do those shy things to your heart's content! Have a nice holiday...hahaha!

After some magical operation of mine... Queen Simona has completely fallen in love with me!

【Emotional System】

Everyone should have rich emotions, and every girl has her own charm...

Through continuous exploration in the game, you will get a deep understanding of all aspects of girls...
Contains 20+ events, more than 100+ 3D video CG, and there are many hidden stories waiting for you to learn more!

Game features:

  • Realistic 3D character image.
  • Easy to use turn-based combat with rich strategy.
  • 20+ events, more than 100+ segments of 3D video CG.
  • Go on an adventure with the protagonist and gain love on the way.

content_descriptors.notes:
- This game features some 3D animated sex scenes, harems, and sexy, passionate girls.
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
- All sexual activities in the game are consensual.

detailed_description:
If you like this game, please add it to your wish list~

Plot summary:

The kingdom’s traitors were tried and the demon king was sealed again. When the country’s crisis was lifted, the brave ushered in his holiday.
I want to be with the queen of this country! Go on vacation together~!

Small island! Beach! swimsuit!

I want to... do those shy things to your heart's content! Have a nice holiday...hahaha!

After some magical operation of mine... Queen Simona has completely fallen in love with me!

【Emotional System】

Everyone should have rich emotions, and every girl has her own charm...

Through continuous exploration in the game, you will get a deep understanding of all aspects of girls...
Contains 20+ events, more than 100+ 3D video CG, and there are many hidden stories waiting for you to learn more!

Game features:

  • Realistic 3D character image.
  • Easy to use turn-based combat with rich strategy.
  • 20+ events, more than 100+ segments of 3D video CG.
  • Go on an adventure with the protagonist and gain love on the way.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

name: Dreamy Love Voyage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card

short_description: "Dreamy Love Voyage - My happy Vacation with My Girlfriend" is a quintessential RPG game with a pure love theme. You will play as a powerful swordsman, embarking on a delightful adventure in a seaside city, romancing the local beauties, and experiencing a plethora of intimate content..
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
